trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The goblin slayer can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The goblin slayer makes two attacks with its scimitars or it makes one scimitar attack and a trip attack.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Trip Attack
entries: Choose one creature of Medium or smaller size within 5ft of the goblin slayer. It must succeed a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or is knocked {@condition prone}.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The goblin mage is a 2nd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). The goblin mage has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The goblin mage can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one creature. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage in melee, or 4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage at range.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The vinebeast has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Forest Camouflage
entries: The vinebeast has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made while in wooded terrain.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The goblin defender can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Protection
entries: When one of its allies is attacked within
5 feet of the goblin defender by a creature it can see, the goblin defender can use its reaction to impose disadvantage on the attack roll.
